title: Three of our children
creator_credit: Ramon Estella, Nicholas Read, British Broadcasting Corporation and United Nations. Film Board
brief_description: Three episodes, set in Greece, French Equatorial Africa and the Philippines, illustrating the work of the United Nations International Children’s Emergency Fund. Commentary by James Mason.
